name: PictureFillSymbol
description: Fill symbols are used to draw polygon features on the graphics layer. PictureFillSymbol uses an image in a repeating pattern. In addition, the symbol can have an optional outline, which is defined by a line symbol.

properties.name: width
properties.summary: Width of the image in pixels

properties.name: height
properties.summary: Height of the image in pixels

properties.name: xoffset
properties.summary: The offset on the x-axis in pixels

properties.name: yoffset
properties.summary: The offset on the y-axis in pixels

methods.name: setHeight
methods.summary: Sets the height of the symbol

methods.name: setUrl
methods.summary: Sets the URL to the location of the symbol

methods.name: setWidth
methods.summary: Sets the width of the symbol

methods.name: setXScale
methods.summary: Sets the scale factor in x direction of the symbol

methods.name: setYScale
methods.summary: Sets the scale factor in y direction of the symbol
